productrequired.name: productrequired
productrequired.description: Represents a product that is needed to complete a visit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the product required was last modified. Its label in the user interface is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the product required was last viewed.

ParentRecordId.description: The work order or work order line item that the product is required for.

ParentRecordType.description: Indicates whether the parent record is a work order or a work order line item.

ProductName.description: The name of the product required.

ProductRequiredNumber.description: (Read only) Auto-generated number identifying the product required.
